input.sentences: i had a very good time last night .
my parents were on the couch .
i wanted to play with my brothers toy .
my parents also bought him a new one .
output.sentences: It was nightfall and time for baby to go to sleep
His big brother sits quietly on the couch hoping he will not be noticed and sent to bed.
Mom and Dad sat on the couch watching TV.
Big brother, happy that he had escaped notice continued to play with his toys.
Not wanting to press his luck, he visits his grandparent's bedroom to share his artwork with them.
